ARABIC: فَمَا ٱسْطَٰعُوٓا۟ أَن يَظْهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسْتَطَٰعُوا۟ لَهُۥ نَقْبًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They were, therefore, unable to climb over it nor were they able to make a breach in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Thus (Gog and Magog) could neither climb over it nor dig a hole through (the rampart).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Such was the rampart that Gog and Magog could not scale, nor could they pierce it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Thus he constructed the barrier which) neither Gog nor Magog were able to climb nor were they able to dig a tunnel through the iron and brass barrier.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore Yajuj and Majuj were neither able to surmount it, nor could they pierce it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So they could not scale it or dig through it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So they were not able to scale it nor could they make a hole in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So they were unable either to scale it or pierce it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And (Gog and Magog) were not able to surmount, nor could they pierce (it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So they [Gog and Magog] were not able to scale it, nor were they able to bore through it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thus they Were not able to mount it, nor Were they able to burrow through it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So they could neither scale it, nor could they make a hole in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus were they made powerless to scale it or to dig through it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So they [Ya'juj and Ma'juj (Gog and Magog)] were made powerless to scale it or dig through it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Thereafter they could neither scale it, nor could they pierce it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So they were unable to climb it, and they could not penetrate it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So Gog and Magog were unable to pass over it, nor were they able [to effect] in it any penetration.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:97] And so they, Gog and Magog, were not able to scale it, to climb up its length, because of its [great] height and smoothness, nor could they pierce it, because of its firmness and thickness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And (Gog and Magog) were not able to surmount) to climb over it, (nor could they pierce (it)) from beneath.
